languages.text: {n}Застывший взгляд упирается вам в переносицу.{/n} "Но есть и другие. Праведные и мученики, что, не ведая того, препятствуют замыслу Неумирающего. Те, кто слишком близок к ошибке и отступничеству, хотя еще не совершил грех. Такие души мы также преподносим Ему".

{n}Her gaze is perfectly still.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who contravene His design without realising it. Those who have come too close to faltering or committing an apostasy, but have not erred yet. We present such souls to the Undying One."
languages.original_text: {n}Застывший взгляд упирается вам в переносицу.{/n} "Но есть и другие. Праведные и мученики, что, не ведая того, препятствуют замыслу Неумирающего. Те, кто слишком близок к ошибке и отступничеству, хотя еще не совершил грех. Такие души мы также преподносим Ему".

traits.locale_text: {n}She fixes an unmoving gaze on the bridge of your nose.{/n} "But there are others. People of virtue and martyrs who await their blissful release from bodily fetters. Their adversity-ravaged souls shine brightly, and when they plead for mercy, we grant it. For there is no greater honour than to present the cut and polished jewel of a soul to the Undying Creator."

{n}She fixes an unmoving gaze on the bridge of your nose.{/n} "But there are others. People of virtue and martyrs who await their blissful release from bodily fetters. Their adversity-ravaged souls shine brightly, and when they plead for mercy, we grant it. For there is no greater honour than to present the cut and polished jewel of a soul to the Undying Creator."

{n}Her expressionless gaze does not waver.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who seek blissful release from the constraints of the flesh. Their tortured souls shine bright. When they plead for mercy, we grant it to them. For they are like jewels — cut and polished through adversity. It is a great honour to present such souls to the Undying One."

{n}Her expressionless gaze does not waver.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who seek blissful release from the constraints of the flesh. Their tortured souls shine bright. When they plead for mercy, we grant it to them. For they are like jewels — cut and polished through adversity. It is a great honour to present such souls to the Undying One."

{n}Her gaze is perfectly still.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who contravene His design without realising it. Those who have come too close to faltering or committing an apostasy, but have not erred yet. We present such souls to the Undying One."

{n}Her gaze is perfectly still.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who contravene His design without realising it. Those who have come too close to faltering or committing an apostasy, but have not erred yet. We present such souls to the Undying One."

languages.text: {n}Son regard demeure parfaitement immobile.{/n} « Mais il y en a d'autres. Les martyrs vertueux qui contreviennent involontairement à Ses desseins. Ceux qui sont à deux doigts de faillir ou d'apostasier, mais n'ont pas encore sauté le pas. Autant d'âmes que nous offrons également à l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze is perfectly still.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who contravene His design without realising it. Those who have come too close to faltering or committing an apostasy, but have not erred yet. We present such souls to the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son regard demeure parfaitement immobile.{/n} « Mais il y en a d'autres. Les martyrs vertueux qui contreviennent involontairement à Ses desseins. Ceux qui sont à deux doigts de faillir ou d'apostasier, mais n'ont pas encore sauté le pas. Autant d'âmes que nous offrons également à l'Immortel. »

languages.text: {n}Su mirada se mantiene totalmente inmóvil.{/n} «Pero hay otros. Los virtuosos mártires que actúan en contra de sus designios sin saberlo. Aquellos que han estado muy cerca de flaquear o de cometer apostasía, pero que aún no han errado. Presentamos tales almas al Inmortal».
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze is perfectly still.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who contravene His design without realising it. Those who have come too close to faltering or committing an apostasy, but have not erred yet. We present such souls to the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su mirada se mantiene totalmente inmóvil.{/n} «Pero hay otros. Los virtuosos mártires que actúan en contra de sus designios sin saberlo. Aquellos que han estado muy cerca de flaquear o de cometer apostasía, pero que aún no han errado. Presentamos tales almas al Inmortal».

languages.text: {n}她的目光没有一丝波澜。{/n}“不过，还不仅如此。还有许多殉道者尽管心地虔诚，但却在不知情的情况下违背了祂的旨意。还有的人尽管还没有犯下罪行，但已经濒临动摇、叛变。我们会将这些人的灵魂带到不死之神面前。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze is perfectly still.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who contravene His design without realising it. Those who have come too close to faltering or committing an apostasy, but have not erred yet. We present such souls to the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的目光没有一丝波澜。{/n}“不过，还不仅如此。还有许多殉道者尽管心地虔诚，但却在不知情的情况下违背了祂的旨意。还有的人尽管还没有犯下罪行，但已经濒临动摇、叛变。我们会将这些人的灵魂带到不死之神面前。”

languages.text: {n}彼女の視線は動かない。{/n}「しかし、他にもいる。数に、ご計画に背く高潔な殉教者たち。挫折しかけたり、背教を犯しかけたもののまだ過ちを犯していない者たち。そのような魂を不死の者に捧げるのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze is perfectly still.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who contravene His design without realising it. Those who have come too close to faltering or committing an apostasy, but have not erred yet. We present such souls to the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の視線は動かない。{/n}「しかし、他にもいる。数に、ご計画に背く高潔な殉教者たち。挫折しかけたり、背教を犯しかけたもののまだ過ちを犯していない者たち。そのような魂を不死の者に捧げるのです」

languages.text: {n}Ihr Blick ist absolut ruhig.{/n} "Aber es gibt andere. Die tapferen Märtyrer, die Sein Werk verletzen, ohne es zu wissen. Jene, die kurz davor sind, eine Apostasie zu begehen, aber noch nicht fehlgegangen sind. Solche Seelen machen wir dem Todlosen zum Geschenk."
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze is perfectly still.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who contravene His design without realising it. Those who have come too close to faltering or committing an apostasy, but have not erred yet. We present such souls to the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihr Blick ist absolut ruhig.{/n} "Aber es gibt andere. Die tapferen Märtyrer, die Sein Werk verletzen, ohne es zu wissen. Jene, die kurz davor sind, eine Apostasie zu begehen, aber noch nicht fehlgegangen sind. Solche Seelen machen wir dem Todlosen zum Geschenk."

languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze is perfectly still.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who contravene His design without realising it. Those who have come too close to faltering or committing an apostasy, but have not erred yet. We present such souls to the Undying One."

languages.text: {n}Kadın, bakışlarını hiç kaçırmıyor.{/n} "Tabii başkaları da var. Farkında olmadan O'nun planına karşı gelen erdemli şehitler. Yoldan çıkmaya veya mürtetliğe soyunmaya fazla yaklaşan ancak henüz yanılgıya düşmeyenler. Bunun gibi ruhları Ölmeyen'in adaletine kavuştururuz."
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze is perfectly still.{/n} "But there are others. The virtuous martyrs who contravene His design without realising it. Those who have come too close to faltering or committing an apostasy, but have not erred yet. We present such souls to the Undying One."
